original: intros pl0 pl1 n m plp0 plp1 H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6. unfold pl_path_incl in H1, H3. induction H1; induction H3. + constructor. + inversion H. + inversion H. + simpl. constructor. ++ apply iad_conv_compat. apply H. ++ apply IHpl_path_incl. apply H. + simpl. constructor. ++ apply iad_conv_compat. apply H3. ++ apply IHpl_path_incl. apply H3. + simpl. constructor. ++ apply IHpl_path_incl. apply H3. + simpl. destruct plp0, plp1. ++ inversion H5. ++ inversion H5. ++ inversion H6. ++ apply pl_path_cons_next. apply IHpl_path_incl. apply H1. apply IHpl_path_incl. apply H3.
